Posts.Content: Jul 22, 2008 06:58AM noella58 wrote: To Annac, My symptoms started around the second week of radiation but seem to be getting worse.My regular MD got the referal to the pulmonologist because the radiation MD essentially blew me off.I.m so weak now I can't function at all and my husband is taking me back to our regular doctor today, We plan on   suggesting to him that this might not be asthma at all and maybe we need to try the prednisone even before I get to see the pulmonologist.What I really don't like about this whole thing is that before the radiation we questioned the radiation oncologist as to what side effects we could expect and he said the only thing would be a little "skin irritation".Well surprise,surprise radiation seems to be able to cause a lot more problems than just a little "skin irritation"!
Posts.Title: Radiation-Induced Pleurisy? annac sdianel
